vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.24.8
§ Harim = "dedicated"
1) a priest in the time of David who had charge of the 3rd course
2) head of a family of exiles totalling 1017 who returned with Zerubbabel
3) another head of a family of exiles totalling 320 who returned with Zerubbabel
4) a priest in the time of Nehemiah
5) a ruler of the people under Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   sacerdote; en tiempos del rey David; (b)   jefe de familia; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈琳 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "獻身的"
1) 大衛時的一位祭司, 負責第三班的事奉工作 (代上 24:8)
2) 一個被擄家族的首領, 其家族共有 1017 人隨所羅巴伯一起回歸 (尼 7:42)
3) 一個被擄家族的首領, 其家族共有 320 人隨所羅巴伯一起回歸 (尼 7:35)
4) 尼希米時代的一位祭司 (尼 10:6)
5) 尼希米手下的一位民的管理者
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
哈琳 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "献身的"
1) 大卫时的一位祭司, 负责第三班的事奉工作 (代上 24:8)
2) 一个被掳家族的首领, 其家族共有 1017 人随所罗巴伯一起回归 (尼 7:42)
3) 一个被掳家族的首领, 其家族共有 320 人随所罗巴伯一起回归 (尼 7:35)
4) 尼希米时代的一位祭司 (尼 10:6)
5) 尼希米手下的一位民的管理者

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.32
§ Harim = "dedicated"
1) a priest in the time of David who had charge of the 3rd course
2) head of a family of exiles totalling 1017 who returned with Zerubbabel
3) another head of a family of exiles totalling 320 who returned with Zerubbabel
4) a priest in the time of Nehemiah
5) a ruler of the people under Nehemiah

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.2; also called Harim at Neh.10.5; 12.15; Nehum at Neh.7.7;
Another name of re.chum (רְחוּם "Rehum" H7348A)
§ Harim = "dedicated"
1) a priest in the time of David who had charge of the 3rd course
2) head of a family of exiles totalling 1017 who returned with Zerubbabel
3) another head of a family of exiles totalling 320 who returned with Zerubbabel
4) a priest in the time of Nehemiah
5) a ruler of the people under Nehemiah
